content.value:
Zamia Hostel is located in one of the best areas in the city, just a few steps of restaurants, markets, pharmacies, hospitals and bus stops, the neighborhood is quite and really safe for walking at any time.

Zamia Hostel offers 2 shared rooms (6 bed and 10 bed dorms), 1 private room with shared bathroom, 3 private rooms (air conditioner and TV) and one family room (air conditioner, TV and minibar).

Zamia Hostel is set in Bucaramanga, within 9 km of CENFER Convention Centre and 2.3 km of Consulate of Spain in Bucaramanga. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.

description.description: Zamia Hostel is your new lodging option in Bucaramanga. Surrounded by bars, restaurants, supermarkets and malls, we offer our customers shared and private rooms. Our staff will help you with anything you need to know about the city and the places nearby. The breakfast is on us!
